hymn.title: Thou whose name is called Jesus

layout.singingstanza: Thou whose name is call -- ed Je -- sus, Ris -- en Lord of life and pow'r, Oh, it is so sweet to trust Thee, Ev -- ery day and ev -- ery hour; Of Thy won -- drous grace I sing, Sav -- ior, Coun -- sel -- lor, and King.

lyrics.stanza: Thou whose name is called Jesus, Risen Lord of life and pow'r, Oh, it is so sweet to trust Thee, Every day and every hour; Of Thy wondrous grace I sing, Savior, Counsellor, and King.
Oh! what joy to trust Thee, Jesus, Mighty Victor o'er the grave, And to learn amid earth's shadows Thine unceasing power to save! Only those who prove Thee know What the grace Thou dost bestow.
Make my life a bright outshining Of Thy life, that all may see Thine own resurrection power Mightily put forth in me; Ever let my heart become Yet more consciously Thy home.
